testcase.classname: Clicking on any card should display the name in textbox
testcase.name: Clicking on any card should display the name in textbox

testcase.classname: Once the card selected based on the current stage able move forward and backward
testcase.name: Once the card selected based on the current stage able move forward and backward

testcase.classname: If the card/task selected from the 1st stage should disable the "Move backward" button.
testcase.name: If the card/task selected from the 1st stage should disable the "Move backward" button.

testcase.classname: If the card/task selected from the last stage should disable the "Move forward" button.
testcase.name: If the card/task selected from the last stage should disable the "Move forward" button.

testcase.classname: After selecting task from 2nd stage and clicking on Move forward button move the card to 3rd stage.
testcase.name: After selecting task from 2nd stage and clicking on Move forward button move the card to 3rd stage.

testcase.classname: After selecting task from 2nd stage and clicking on Move backward button move the card to 1st stage.
testcase.name: After selecting task from 2nd stage and clicking on Move backward button move the card to 1st stage.

testcase.classname: Move forward an item till the last state and should disable the move forward button
testcase.name: Move forward an item till the last state and should disable the move forward button

testcase.classname: Move backward an item till the first state and should disable the move backward button
testcase.name: Move backward an item till the first state and should disable the move backward button
